item.title: Laura add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Laura add a quote by William Shakespeare
Laura add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Books are the treasured wealth of the world and the fit inheritance of generations and nations." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Laura add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Laura add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description:
"Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
[misquote of a letter about wine, see quotes/831031]" -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Laura add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "Unfortunately, Susan didn't remember what Jane Fulton once said, 'Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Rita Mae Brown
